```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(bookdown)
library(ggplot2)
```



\section*{Country XX1 and YY1"}

\section*{Country XX2 and YY2}

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
dat <- read.csv("Assignment3_data.csv")
dat1 <- dat %>%
  filter(Country_Name %in% c("China",
                             "Brazil")) %>%
  group_by(Year) 
```

```{r tbl-1, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
d1 <- dat %>%
  filter(Country_Name %in% c("China",
                             "Brazil")) %>%
  select(Country_Name,
         IncomeGroup,
         Urban_population) %>%
  group_by(Country_Name, IncomeGroup) %>%
  summarise(population = sum(Urban_population, na.rm = TRUE)) 
d2 <- d1 %>%
  select(Country_Name,
         IncomeGroup)
kable(d2)
```

```{r fig-1, fig.cap="CO2 emissions per capita per year for both countries (tonnes)", fig.align='center', eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(dat1, aes(x = Year,
                 y = CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita,
                 color = Country_Name)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "CO2 emissions tons/capita")
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
dat2 <- dat %>%
  filter(Country_Name %in% c("China",
                             "Brazil")) %>%
  select(Country_Name,
         CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita,
         Urban_population) %>%
  group_by(Urban_population) %>%
  rename(CO2_emissions = CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita) 
  
```
```{r fig-2, fig.cap="CO2 emissions per capita and urban population", fig.align='center', eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(dat2, aes(x = Urban_population,
                 y = CO2_emissions,
                 color = Country_Name)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x = "Urban population",
       y = "CO2 emissions tons/capita")
```
